articles.content:
Greetings to German President 
   Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Horst Kohler, President of Germany, on Oct. 3 on the occasion of its national day.
 Kim, in the message, wished the German President success in his responsible work, expressing the belief that the bilateral ties would develop on good terms in mutual interests in the future, too.

Greetings to Sotho King
   Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to King of Lesotho Letsie III Monday on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the independence of Lesotho.
 The message wished the King and people of Lesotho great success in their work to achieve durable stability and socio-economic development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Gambian President
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Here
   Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Russian International Charity Fund "Protectors of Arts for the Century" led by its President Oleg Oleinik arrived here Tuesday.
 It was greeted at the airport by Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairwoman of the Korea-Russia Friendship Association, and Andrei Karlov, Russian ambassador to the DPRK.    
 The committee hosted a reception in honor of the delegation this evening.

Greetings to Gambian President
   Pyongyang, October 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Yaya A.J.J. Jammeh on his reelection as President of Gambia.
 Expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, the message wished him greater success in his responsible work for the development of the country and the welfare of the people.
